original: intros client id i net e p es H1 H2 H3 H4 H5 H6. unfold applied_implies_input_state. intros orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params client0 id0 i0 net0 H. destruct H as [e' [H7 H8]]. exists e'. split. - destruct H8 as [[h H9] | [p' [entries [H10 [H11 H12]]]]]. + destruct H7 as [H13 H14]. split. * apply H13. * left. apply H14. + destruct H7 as [H13 H14]. split. * apply H13. * right. right. exists p', entries. auto. - auto.
